original_text: But the people are many, and it is a time of much rain, and we are not able to stand without, neither is this a work of one day or two: for we are many that have transgressed in this thing.
korean_text: 그러나 백성이 많고 또 큰 비가 내리는 때니 능히 밖에 서지 못할 것이요 우리가 이 일로 크게 범죄하였은즉 하루 이틀에 할 일이 아니오니

sentences.original_text: and it is a time of much rain
and we are not able to stand without
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 밖에 서 있을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: neither is this a work of one day or two
for we are many that have transgressed
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 우리는 범죄한 자들이 많기 때문입니다
